sections.title: Magus (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Magus class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Magus)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with simple and martial weapons and light armor, allowing spellcasting in light armor without arcane spell failure chance.

sections.title: Spells (Magus)
sections.description: Provides arcane spellcasting using Intelligence with prepared spells from the magus spell list, including cantrips and spellbook mechanics.

sections.title: Arcane Pool (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Creates a pool of points equal to 1/2 magus level + Intelligence modifier that can enhance weapons with bonuses and special properties as a swift action.

sections.title: Spell Combat (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Allows casting spells and making weapon attacks in the same full-round action, functioning like two-weapon fighting with penalties and concentration bonuses.

sections.title: Spellstrike (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Enables delivery of touch spells through weapon attacks, combining weapon damage with spell effects and using weapon critical range.

sections.title: Magus Arcana (Magus)
sections.description: Grants special arcane secrets starting at 3rd level and every three levels thereafter, providing unique magical abilities.

sections.title: Spell Recall (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Allows spending arcane pool points as a swift action to re-prepare previously cast spells, costing points equal to spell level.

sections.title: **Bonus Feats** (Magus)
sections.description: Grants bonus feats at 5th level and every six levels thereafter, limited to combat, item creation, or metamagic feats.

sections.title: Knowledge Pool (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Allows spending arcane pool points during spell preparation to temporarily add any magus spell to spellbook for that day.

sections.title: Medium Armor (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Grants medium armor proficiency and allows casting magus spells in medium armor without arcane spell failure chance.

sections.title: Improved Spell Combat (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Provides a +2 circumstance bonus on concentration checks when using spell combat ability.

sections.title: Fighter Training (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Counts half magus level as fighter level for feat prerequisites, stacking with actual fighter levels if present.

sections.title: Improved Spell Recall (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Reduces spell recall cost to half spell level and allows preparing different spells of same level as a swift action.

sections.title: Heavy Armor (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Grants heavy armor proficiency and allows casting magus spells in heavy armor without arcane spell failure chance.

sections.title: Greater Spell Combat (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Doubles the concentration check bonus from spell combat, making the bonus equal to twice the attack penalty taken.

sections.title: Counterstrike (Ex) (Magus)
sections.description: Grants an attack of opportunity against enemies who successfully cast spells defensively within reach.

sections.title: Greater Spell Access (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Adds 14 wizard spells to spellbook as magus spells and allows casting them without somatic components or spell failure.

sections.title: True Magus (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Eliminates concentration checks for defensive casting with spell combat and provides bonuses when targeting the same creature with spells and attacks.

sections.title: Legendary Blade (Su) (Magus)
sections.description: Grants an additional +2 enhancement bonus when using arcane pool to enhance weapons, for a total maximum of +7.
